column3: A cookie has been set without the secure flag, which means that the cookie can be accessed via unencrypted connections.
A cookie has been set without the HttpOnly flag, which means that the cookie can be accessed by JavaScript.
X-Frame-Options header is not included in the HTTP response to protect against 'ClickJacking' attacks.
Content Security Policy (CSP) header not set
Content Security Policy (CSP) Report-Only header encountered
Server Leaks Version Information via "Server" HTTP Response Header Field
Incomplete or No Cache-control and Pragma HTTP Header Set
